page.title: 18LILLIESLEAF SCHOOL
page.content: {LILLIESLEAF SCHOOL}WAS BUILT IN{1962.} IT HAS TWO CLASSROOMS AND A DINNER HALL.IT HAS 27 CHILDREN TWO TEACHERS AND SIX VISITING TEACHERS.IT HAS A BIG PITCH FOR PLAYING FOOTBALL AND A TYRE SWING AND A CLIMBING FRAME,A BIG NET BALL COURT A TARRED PLAYGROUND AND A BIG ORCHARD.THE CHILDREN ARE AGED FROM 5 TO 12 AND THEY GO TO SELKIRK HIGH SCHOOL FROM HERE.A PLAY GROUP MEETS HERE ON A WEDNESDAY AND FRIDAY MORNING AND A MOTHER AND TODDLERS ON TUESDAY MORNING.GUIDES MEET ON MONDAY NIGHTS. HOPEFULLY THERE WILL BE A JUDO CLUB IN THE NEAR FUTURE.THE KITCHEN HAS ONE COOK AND SHE MAKES DINNER FOR THE CHILDREN.THE SCHOOL EMPLOYS ONE CLEANER.IT IS HEATED BY AN OIL BOILER. IN THE MORNING THERE IS A BUS THAT BRINGS THE CHILDREN FROM OUT SIDE THE VILLAGE,AND IN THE AFTERNOON THEY GET HOME BY TAXI.
